name: DEP® irinotecan
description: DEP® irinotecan is a novel, patented nanoparticle formulation of SN-38, the active metabolite of irinotecan, delivered using Starpharma’s proprietary DEP® technology. DEP® irinotecan has shown a number of benefits compared to the original form of irinotecan, including significant improvements in anti-cancer efficacy and improved survival in multiple human cancer models. DEP® irinotecan is the third DEP® product to enter the clinic from Starpharma’s internal portfolio.
